ISSUE.TITLE: Properties not accessible from liquid
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Describe the bug Blank values are returned when trying to access the Shape `Properties` property. ``` {{ someContentItem| shape_build_display | shape_properties: someProp: "SomeValue" | shape_render }} ``` ``` {{ Model.Properties.SomeProp }} // this return blank {{ Model.SomeProp }} // this works ```

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Show technical name of content type and display name of Content Parts in Edit Content Type page (#9445)
